Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are inside the gate of the Necropolis. Shivers runs down your spine..
Room.LongDescription: The path you are on leads north and south, and is paved with simple crushed gravel. On both sides to the east and west you see a well kept cemetery with plain tombstones imbedded in the cold earth. An eerie mist is curling around you as walk on the path, a mist that is not visible from outside the gate. Perhaps you are imagining it, but perhaps the residents of the necropolis don't like sunny days or visitors.
